page.title: 01WORKSOP A DESCRIPTION
page.content: Worksop is a market town with a population of around 30,000. It lies at the edge of the Dukeries and Sherwood Forest tourist areas. Worksop is an important route centre linking the East coast below the Humber with the Sheffield conurbation. Local industries include wire manufacture, clothing manufacture, charcoal manufacture, light engineering and glass bottle manufacture. Coal mining is a major industry in the area. Farming is important around the outskirts of Worksop, this being mainly cereals, root crops, potatoes and rape.
